import Mathlib

open Filter

variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type*} [MetricSpace Y]

/-- Let X be a topological space and Y a metric space. Let f_n : X â†’ Y be a sequence of continuous
functions, and let x_n be a sequence in X converging to x. If f_n â†’ f uniformly, then f_n(x_n) â†’ f(x).
-/
theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8
  (f : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f_lim : X â†’ Y) (x : â„• â†’ X) (x0 : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f n))
  (h_x : Tendsto x atTop (ð“ x0))
  (h_unif : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, âˆ€ t : X, dist (f n t) (f_lim t) < Îµ) :
  Tendsto (fun n => f n (x n)) atTop (ð“ (f_lim x0)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter

variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable {Y : Type*} [MetricSpace Y]

/-- Let X be a topological space and Y a metric space. Let f_n : X â†’ Y be a sequence of continuous
functions, and let x_n be a sequence in X converging to x. If f_n â†’ f uniformly, then f_n(x_n) â†’ f(x).
-/
theorem Munkres_exercise_21_8
  (f : â„• â†’ X â†’ Y) (f_lim : X â†’ Y) (x_seq : â„• â†’ X) (x0 : X)
  (h_cont : âˆ€ n, Continuous (f n))
  (h_x : Tendsto x_seq atTop (nhds x0))
  (h_unif : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, âˆ€ t : X, dist (f n t) (f_lim t) < Îµ) :
  Tendsto (fun n => f n (x_seq n)) atTop (nhds (f_lim x0)) := by sorry
